title: It’s Fine To Reincarnate To A Flame - Novel Updates
tags: Cheats   Dwarfs   Evolution   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Game Elements   God-human Relationship   Godly Powers   Kingdom Building   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Reincarnated as an Object   Saints   System Administrator   Weak to Strong
author: Infinite Fire
description:
He transmigrates to the an alternate world and turns into a flame that is about to be extinguished. 

He thinks that he has activated Hell mode but at the critical moment, a system is activated! 

As long as he burns everything, he can easily obtain Fire Points and evolve infinitely! 

“Ding! You have burned a hibernating dung beetle, Fire Points awarded.” 

“Ding! Your Fire Points have reached the upper limit, Skill Unlocked: Burning Flames.” 

“Ding! Your Stats have been upgraded, Evolving into Red Lotus Flame.” 

It’s fine to reincarnate into a flame. Evolving from a wildfire to the God of Flames who rules over the gods, I’ll make all the gods shiver because of me!>
